description: Support to the UNRC office to coordinate the emergency response, identify immediate humanitarian needs and develop recovery framework of the 2009 flood affected communities.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacities to integrate into the global economic system and to negotiate and manage traditional & emerging development finance for inclusive development
subproject.description: (i) Support coordination of cluster approach through Resident Coordinators Office, (ii) Support joint assessment of the impact of disaster, (iii) facilitate emergency appeal process and (iv) support emergency preparedness and planning for Lao PDR.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: TRAC3 2009 Typhoon Ketsana
